desc: Hand-Made and Hand-Poured to order Coconut Soy Candles, Brittle Wax Melts & Natural Fiber Reed Diffusers. Our products use nothing but Paraffin free 100% Natural Pure Virgin Coconut-Soy based waxes, Natural Crackling Wooden Wicks, Phthalate and Paraben free Fragrances, and 100% recyclable and reusable vessels.

layout.text: Home of our in-house blend Coconut Soy wax Candles.
